faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.changePlan: Can I change my plan at any time?
faq.changePlanAnswer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade at any time. Changes take effect immediately.
faq.exceedLimits: What happens if I exceed my plan limits?
faq.exceedLimitsAnswer: You will be notified when you approach limits. To continue using the service, you will need to upgrade to a higher plan.
faq.dataOnDowngrade: What happens to my data if I downgrade?
faq.dataOnDowngradeAnswer: Your data is preserved. However, you will need to adapt to the limits of the new plan.
faq.freeTrial: Is there a free trial for paid plans?
faq.freeTrialAnswer: Yes, we offer a 14-day free trial for Pro and Enterprise plans. No credit card required.

rename.overwriteDescription: Replaces the existing key if it exists

testimonials.title: User feedback
testimonials.subtitle: What our users think of LocalKit

testimonial1.quote: LocalKit has completely transformed the way we manage translations. The interface is intuitive and the GitHub integration is perfect.
testimonial1.author: Sophie Laurent

testimonial2.quote: Inline editing and the missing keys system saved us considerable time. Essential for our team.
testimonial2.author: Marc Dubois

testimonial3.quote: Simple, efficient and perfectly integrated into our workflow. Our team couldn't do without it!
testimonial3.author: Alice Martin

pricing.title: Simple and transparent pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that fits your needs
pricing.trial: All plans include a 14-day trial with no commitment.

cta.title: Ready to simplify your translations?
cta.subtitle: Start for free today with your GitHub account

q1.question: What translation formats are supported?
q1.answer: LocalKit supports all standard i18next formats: JSON, YAML and ZIP files containing multiple locales. Import and export are bidirectional for maximum flexibility.

q2.question: How does the GitHub integration work?
q2.answer: Once connected with GitHub, you can automatically sync your translations with your repository. LocalKit can create automatic Pull Requests when modifications are made.

q3.question: Is it free to use?
q3.answer: Yes! LocalKit offers a generous free plan to discover the tool. Paid plans are available for teams requiring more features.

q4.question: Can I collaborate with my team?
q4.answer: Absolutely! LocalKit is designed for team collaboration. Share your projects and work together on your translations in real time.

q5.question: Is there a project limit?
q5.answer: The free plan allows 1 project with up to 5 locales and 1000 keys. Paid plans offer unlimited projects and locales.
